scripts.debugtest: WABT='WABT/build' npx mocha --exit --reporter src/framework/MochaReporter.ts --require ts-node/register --ui bdd ./src/debugger.test.ts
scripts.spectest: WABT='WABT/build' CORESUITE='core/' npx mocha --exit --reporter src/framework/MochaReporter.ts --require ts-node/register --ui bdd ./src/spec.test.ts
scripts.primtest: WABT='WABT/build' npx mocha --exit --reporter src/framework/MochaReporter.ts --require ts-node/register --ui bdd ./src/primitives.test.ts
